titleStmt.title: Panorama: the Branch Davidian sect: documentary. Sample containing about 5897 words speech recorded in leisure context

person.persNote: This is almost certainly David Koresh speaking, but
May well be an actor portraying a Davidian

event.desc: sound of burning and dramatic music

telephone being dialled, overlaps next part of speech

theme music, reprise, to end of job
